Keywords: Female Furies , Injustice League , Legion of Doom , Scientist , Secret Six , Secret Society of Super-Villains , Suicide Squad
Real Name: Dr. Doris Zuel
Special Powers
GIANT RETALIATION: VILLAINS UNITE: POWER: If no other friendly character has been placed this turn, choose an opposing character that attacked Giganta or damaged another friendly character since your last turn. Place Giganta such that she can make a close attack targeting the chosen character, then do so. // If Giganta is on a themed team this trait is activated as FREE instead.
SIZE MANIPULATION: At the beginning of your turn, you may choose that Giganta has [Giant symbol] until your next turn. If you do, she takes a maximum of 2 damage from attacks until your next turn.

Emperorj0ker
I'm literally quoting you the new comp rulebook. As active player i can choose what beginning of turn effects can resolve in what order. It's how you could use leadership with an id call in figure before it was removed from the map on the following turn. As active player i choose she becomes a giant. And then she rolls for willpower as it is still beginning of the turn. There is no post for here in the rules forum as i went and looked. Feel free to send the person saying that my way so i can tell them they are very very wrong. The way you describe it if i roll great size before my leadership roll I'm just #### out of luck and that just isn't the case at all. 9.1 Beginning of Turn Only things that specifically say they happen during the beginning of a turn can happen during this phase. Most commonly this includes effects triggered at the beginning of each turn, at the beginning of your turn, or at the beginning of your opponent’s turn. 9.1a Ending the Beginning of Turn Phase The Beginning of Turn phase ends after all beginning of turn effects (optional or mandatory) have happened or a player has chosen to not use them.
June 16, 2021
Goop
No, she can't. She gains Willpower on resolve. It can no longer be added to the initial trigger. 1h just says turn player picks resolve order. Everything triggers, then resolves in turn players order choice. Check the rules forum for further in depth on this. [url]http://www.hcrealms.com/forum/showthread.php?t=832270[/url]
June 16, 2021
Emperorj0ker
She completely can through active player choose to change her size then roll for great size willpower. .1h Timing of Multiple Triggered Effects If multiple triggered effects would resolve at the same time, the active player chooses in which order they resolve. 13.5 The Rules of the Active Player The Active Player is the player that is currently taking their turn. When order matters for effects or choices that would resolve simultaneously, the active player chooses the order in which to resolve those effects, though any simultaneous effects with “immediately” must happen before other simultaneous effects.
June 7, 2021
Goop
Thats correct, its been discussed in rules forum pretty in depth. The short answer is that you simply miss the trigger.
June 7, 2021
Dortmuner
[QUOTE=KevinLouisOBrien04;12140776]I believe if you have multiple things that trigger 'at the beginning of your turn'. you choose the order. So you could choose a size, then willpower. Correct me if I'm wrong.[/QUOTE] I think what Goop is saying is that you would need to already have Giant size for it to trigger at the beginning of your turn. If at the beginning of your turn you choose to get it, your turn has already begun by the time you actually have it and therefore you missed your window for the Willpower to be triggered.
June 7, 2021
KevinLouisOBrien04

Goop
I like this figure a lot, she can get across the map really fast with her retaliate and has a trait that can't be outwitted limiting her damage intake on a very long dial. Strong piece all around. Unfortunately you wont ever be able to use her colossal willpower since she misses the trigger at start of turn.
